guild.description:
See a bug while using Ruqqus? File it here and we'll open an issue for the Ruqqus devs to resolve. Before posting, look around first to see if the bug hasn't already been filed. If so, just upvote it or leave a comment to show your support. When a bug is resolved, the status will be reported back in the original thread.

Please only use this guild to file _bugs_. For suggestions or feature requests, use +Ruqqus or +BetaFeedback.

body:
I am getting the error `field is null`, `all_js.js:31:68`.

    autoExpand https://ruqqus.com/assets/js/all_js.js?v=2.29.9.9:31
    toggleEdit https://ruqqus.com/assets/js/all_js.js?v=2.29.9.9:17
    onclick https://ruqqus.com/notifications:1
    onload https://ruqqus.com/assets/js/all_js.js?v=2.29.9.9:158

But oddly it worked the third time I tried to enable it on the same page, but I still got the error again, except without the `onload` part.
body_html:
I am getting the error field is null, all_js.js:31:68.

autoExpand https://ruqqus.com/assets/js/all_js.js?v=2.29.9.9:31
toggleEdit https://ruqqus.com/assets/js/all_js.js?v=2.29.9.9:17
onclick https://ruqqus.com/notifications:1
onload https://ruqqus.com/assets/js/all_js.js?v=2.29.9.9:158

But oddly it worked the third time I tried to enable it on the same page, but I still got the error again, except without the onload part.
